GK16vamkalvu:1029: kuvalayadalaśyāmā meghā vihāya divaṃ gatāḥ kuvalayadalaśyāmo nidrāṃ vimuñcati keśavaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1030: kuvalayadalaśyāmā śyāmā latādya vijṛmbhate kuvalayadalaśyāmaṃ candro nabhaḥ pratigāhate //
GK16vamkalvu:1044: yathā uoamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge ityatropamitagrahaṇameva kṛtaṃ , nopamānagrahaṇamiti
GK16vamkalvu:1049: na hi yathā mukhaṃ kamalamiva iti , tathā kumudamiva ityapi bhavati //1//
GK16vamkalvu:1051: guṇānāṃ bāhulyaṃ guṇabāhulyaṃ , tata upamānopameyayoḥ sāmyāt kalpitopamā /
GK16vamkalvu:1063: tataḥ strīṇāṃ hanta kṣamamadharakāntiṃ tulayituṃ samantānniryāti sphuṭasubhagarāgaṃ kisalayam
GK16vamkalvu:1069: haritatanuṣu babhrutvagvimuktāsu yāsāṃ kanakakaṇasadharmā mānmatho romabhedaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1074: sā upamā pūrṇā luptā ca bhavati //4//
GK16vamkalvu:1087: stutinindayoryathā snigdhaṃ bahvatyamṛtakalpamaho kalatraṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣamivāpaguṇaṃ tadeva
GK16vamkalvu:1096: jātyā pramāṇena dharmeṇa copamānasya nyūnatā yā taddhīnatvamiti /
GK16vamkalvu:1111: avyabhicāre tu bhavantī pratipattiḥ kena vāryate tadāha ----
GK16vamkalvu:1129: sādhvyaḥ svageheṣviva bhartṛhīnāḥ kekā vineśuḥ śikhināṃ mukheṣu //
GK16vamkalvu:1137: viśantu viṣṭayaḥ śīghraṃ rudrā iva mahaujasaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1146: ata evāsmākaṃ mate ṣaḍ doṣā iti //11//
GK16vamkalvu:1154: ---- candramiva mukhaṃ paśyati iti , induriva mukhaṃ bhāti evamprāyaṃ tu necchanti //13//
GK16vamkalvu:1158: chāyeva sa tasyāḥ , puruṣa iva strī iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1173: kāvyasya śaśinā saha yat sādṛśyaṃ tadapratītaireva guṇairiti /
GK16vamkalvu:1174: nanu ca arthānāṃ raśmitulyatve sati kāvyasya śaśitulyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16vamkalvu:1177: na hyarthānāṃ ca kaścit sādṛśyahetuḥ pratīto guṇo'sti /
GK16vamkalvu:1191: ekasminnupamāne prayukte upamānāntaraprayogo na kañcidarthaviśeṣaṃ puṣṇāti
GK16vamkalvu:1192: / tena balasindhuḥ sindhuriva kṣubhitaḥ iti prayuktam /
GK16vamkalvu:1195: arthaviśeṣāt balaṃ sindhuriva vaipulyād balasindhuḥ sindhuriva kṣubhita iti kṣobhasārūpyāt
GK16vamkalvu:1213: viruddhasyātiśayasya saṃgraho na kartavya iti asya sūtrasya tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1242: lāvaṇyasinduraparaiva hi kācaneyaṃ yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavante /
GK16vamkalvu:1243: unmañjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1247: sanena tulyena vastunā vākyārthenānyasya vākyārthasyāpalāpo nihnavo yastattvādhyāropaṇāyāsāvapahnutiḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1249: na ketakīnāṃ vilasanti sūcayaḥ pravāsino hanta hasatyayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1250: taḍillateyaṃ na cakāsti cañcalā puraḥ smarajyotiridaṃ vivartate //
GK16vamkalvu:1255: upamānopameyayorubhayorapi grahaṇaṃ laukikyāḥ kalpitāyāścopamāyāḥ prakṛkṣitvamatra yathā vijñāyeteti
GK16vamkalvu:1259: ayaṃ kaṣṭhe vāhuḥ śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo paramasahyastu virahaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1267: ākṛṣṭāmalamaṇḍalāgrarucayaḥ saṃnaddhakṣaḥsthalāḥ soṣmāṇo vraṇitā vipakṣahṛdayapronmāthinaḥ karkaśaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1268: udvṛttā guravaśca yasya śaminaḥ śyāmāyamānānanā yodhā vāravadhūstanāśca na daduḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vo'vyājjinaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1269: yathā ca gauṇasyārthasyālaṅkāratvaṃ tathā lākṣaṇikasyāpīti darśayitumāha
GK16vamkalvu:1274: unmimīla kamalaṃ sarasīnāṃ kairavaṃ ca na mimīla muhūrtāt /
GK16vamkalvu:1276: iha ca nirantaranavamukulapulakitā harati mādhavī hṛdayam /
GK16vamkalvu:1279: saṃsthānena sphuratu subhagaḥ svarciṣā cumbatu dyām /
GK16vamkalvu:1284: ityevamādiṣu lakṣaṇārtho nirūpyata iti lakṣaṇāyā jhaṭityarthapratipattikṣamatvaṃ rahasyamācakṣata iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1300: sa vaḥ pāyādindurnavavisalatākoṭikuṭilaḥ smarāreryo mūrdhni jvalanakapiṣe bhāti nihitaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1301: sravanmandākinyāḥ pratidivasasiktena payasā kapālenonmuktaḥ sphaṭikadhavalenāṅkura iva //
GK16vamkalvu:1311: śaśabhṛti vitatadhāmni dhvalayati dharāmavibhāvyatāṃ gatāḥ priyavasatiṃ prayānti sukhameva nirastabhiyo'bhisārikāḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1315: upamānopameyayoratiśayārthaṃ yaḥ kriyate saṃśayaḥ sa saṃdehaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1318: na niścinoti hṛdayaṃ kintu dolāyate manaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1323: pītaṃ pānamidaṃ tvayādya dayite mattaṃ mamedaṃ manaḥ patrālī tava kuṅkumena racitā raktā vayaṃ mānini ! /
GK16vamkalvu:1325: stvanmadhye tanutā mamādhṛtiraho premṇo vicitrā gatiḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1327: sā bālā vayamapragalbhavacasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam /
GK16vamkalvu:1328: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśritairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam //
GK16vamkalvu:1331: kriyāyāḥ pratiṣedhe tasyā eva kriyāyāḥ phalasya prasiddhasya vyaktivibhāvanā /
GK16vamkalvu:1345: khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva khaṃ haṃsa iva śaśī śaśīva haṃso'yam /
GK16vamkalvu:1349: samena visadṛśena vārthena arthasya parivartanaṃ parivṛttiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1364: upamānavākyepūpameyavācyeṣu caikā kriyā anupaṅgataḥ sambandhyamānā dīpakam
GK16vamkalvu:1371: brahmāṇaḥ śrutigaditaiḥ kriyākalāpai , rājāno viralitavairibhiḥ pratāpaiḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1378: kriyayaiva śuddhayā svasyātmanastadarthaḥ cānvayasya saṃbandhasya khyāpanaṃ saṃlulitahetudṛṣṭāntavibhāgadarśanānnidarśanam
GK16vamkalvu:1390: uktasiddhyai uktasyārthasya siddhyartha vastuno vākyārthāntarasyaiva nyasanamarthāntaranyāsaḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1394: arthāntarasyaiveti vacanam , yatra heturvyāptigūḍhatvāt kathañcit pratīyate tatra yathā syāt
GK16vamkalvu:1398: srajaṃ na kācidvijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni //
GK16vamkalvu:1399: arthāntaranyāsasya heturūpatvād , hetoścānvayavyatirekātmakatvānna pṛthagvyatireka iti kecit
GK16vamkalvu:1402: upameyasya guṇātirekatvaṃ guṇādhikyaṃ yad arthādupamānāt sa vyatirekaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1408: kuvalayavanaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ navaṃ madhu ninditaṃ hasitamamṛtaṃ bhagnaṃ svādoḥ padaṃ rasasaṃvadaḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1412: ekasya guṇasya hāneḥ kalpanāyāṃ śeṣairguṇaissāmyaṃ yattasya dārḍhyaṃ viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1416: dyūtaṃ hi nāma puruṣasyā'siṃhāsanaṃ rājyam /(Mṛcchakaṭikā aṃ. 2)
GK16vamkalvu:1428: atyantaguṇādhiko viśiṣṭastasya ca karma viśiṣṭakarma , tasya sambhāvyasya kartuṃ śakyasyākaraṇānnindāviśiṣṭasāmyasampādanena stotrārthā vyājastutiḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1431: evaṃvidhaṃ karma tatāna rāmastvayā kṛtaṃ tanna mudhaiva garvaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1448: tasyāścenmukhamasti saumyasubhagaṃ kiṃ pārvaṇenendunā saundaryasya padaṃ dṛśau ca yadi cet kiṃ nāma nīlotpalaiḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1449: kiṃ vā komalakāntibhiḥ kisalayaiḥ satyeva tatrādhare hā dhātuḥ punaruktavasturacanārambheṣvapūrvo grahaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1454: atra śaradveśyeva , induṃ nāyakamiva , raveḥ pratināyakasyevetyupamānāni ganyanta iti //27//
GK16vamkalvu:1459: astaṃ bhāsvān prayātaḥ saha ripubhirayaṃ saṃhriyantāṃ balāni /
GK16vamkalvu:1460: atrārthayornyūnatvaviśiṣṭatve na sta iti neyaṃ tulyayogiteti //
GK16vamkalvu:1464: yasya vastunaḥ sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate tasya vastunaḥ sampattiḥ samāhitam /
GK16vamkalvu:1467: cintāmohamivāsthitā madhulihāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā //
GK16vamkalvu:1468: atra purūravaso latāyāmurvaśyāḥ sādṛśyaṃ gṛhṇataḥ saiva latorvaśī saṃpanneti //29//
GK16vamkalvu:1469: ete cālaṅkārāḥ śuddhā miśrāśca prayoktavyā iti viśiṣṭānām alaṅkārāṇāṃ miśratvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭirityāha
GK16vamkalvu:1478: niravadhi ca nirāśrayaṃ ca yasya sthitamanivartitakautukaprapañcam /
GK16vamkalvu:1479: prathama iva bhavān sa kūrmamūrtirjayati caturdaśalokavallikandaḥ //
GK16vamkalvu:1494: samprati kāvyasamayaṃ śabdaśuddhiṃ ca darśayituṃ prāyogikākhyamadhikaraṇamārabhyate /
GK16vamkalvu:1496: naikaṃ padaṃ dviḥ prayojyaṃ prāyeṇa // VKal_5,1.1 //
GK16vamkalvu:1497: ekaṃ padaṃ na dviḥ prayojyaṃ prāyeṇa bāhulyena /
GK16vamkalvu:1510: na sarvatra , na sarvasmin vṛtta iti
GK16vamkalvu:1512: yāsāṃ balirbhavati madgṛhadehalīnāṃ haṃsaiśca sārasagaṇaiśca viluptapūrvaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1519: na gādye samāptaprāyaṃ vṛttam, anyatrodgatādibhyaḥ saṃvādāt // VKal_5,1.4
GK16vamkalvu:1526: yeṣāmādau prayogo na śloṣyati te gṛhyante /
GK16vamkalvu:1534: bahubrīhipratipattiṃ karoti yaḥ karmadhārayaḥ sa na prayoktavyaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1544: sambhāvyasya niṣedhasya nivartane svau pratiṣedhau prayoktavyau yathā ----
GK16vamkalvu:1545: samaramūrdhani yena tarasvinā na na jito vijayī tridaśeśvaraḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1551: nidhānagarbhāmiva sāgarāmbarām atra hi pṛthivyā viśeṣaṇamātrameva prayuktam /
GK16vamkalvu:1562: sambandhena sanbandhaḥ sambandhasambandhastasmin ṣaṣṭhī prayojyā kvacit ,
GK16vamkalvu:1565: kamalena saṃbaddhā kamalinī tasyā kandaḥ iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1570: yoṣidityabhilalāṣa na hālām ityatra hālā iti deśabhāṣāpadam /
GK16vamkalvu:1577: vatse ! mā bahu niḥśvasīḥ kuru surāgaṇḍūpamekaṃ śanaiḥ ityādiṣu gaṇḍūṣaśabdaḥ puṃsi bhūyasā prayukto , na striyām āmnāto'pi strītvaṃ /
GK16vamkalvu:1579: mā bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madakalaḥ paraśurvā /
GK16vamkalvu:1580: vāhinījalabharaḥ kuliśaṃ vā svasti te'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa ! //
GK16vamkalvu:1588: teṣāṃ lakṣaṇāśabdānāṃ bāhulyamekasmin vākye na prayojyam /
GK16vamkalvu:1589: śakyate hyekasyāvācakasya vācakavadbhāvaḥ kartuṃ , na bahūnāmiti //16//
GK16vamkalvu:1591: stanādīnāṃ dvitvāviṣṭā dvitvādhyāsitā jātiḥ prāyeṇa bāhulyene ti /
GK16vamkalvu:1615: tallakṣaṇaścedeva viśeṣaḥ ityanuvartata iti tatraivakārakaraṇāt strīpuṃsakṛta eva viśeṣo bhavatīti vyavasthitam /
GK16vamkalvu:1617: etena indrau bhavau śarvau ityādayaḥ prayogāḥ pratyuktāḥ //1//
GK16vamkalvu:1625: vardhate dhātugaṇaḥ iti hi śabdavida ācakṣate /
GK16vamkalvu:1629: valeranudāttettvādātmanepade yat tadanityaṃ dṛśyate ---- lajjālolaṃ valantī ityādiorayogeṣu
GK16vamkalvu:1632: cakṣiṅo dvayanubandhakaraṇam // VKal_5,2.4 [k: not in sutra] //
GK16vamkalvu:1640: kṣīyatī iti prayogo dṛśyate , sa karmakartari draṣṭavyaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1643: khidyata iti ca prayogo dṛśyate , so'karmakartaryeva draṣṭavyā , na kartari /
GK16vamkalvu:1647: ā dhṛṣādvā iti vikalpitaṇickastasyādyadātmanepadaṃ dṛśyate ---- mārgantāṃ dehabhāramiti ,
GK16vamkalvu:1657: astyayaṃ labhiryaḥ prāptyupasarjanāṃ gatimāha ---- asti ca [k: yo]
GK16vamkalvu:1659: atra pūrvasminpakṣe gatyarthatvāllabherṇicyaṇau yaḥ kartā tasya gatyādisūtreṇa karmasaṃjñā
GK16vamkalvu:1661: dīrghikāsu kumudāni vikāsaṃ lambhayanti śiśirāḥ śaśibhāsaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1664: sitaṃ sitimnā sutarāṃ munervapurvisāribhiḥ saudhamivātha lambhayan /
GK16vamkalvu:1667: tvayā mayetyasminnarthe te me śabdau nipāteṣu draṣṭavyau /
GK16vamkalvu:1669: śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ tasya , vedānadhīta iti nādhigataṃ purā me /
GK16vamkalvu:1675: tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ , tiraso'nyatarasyām(Pā_8,3.42) iti sakāraḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1676: tat kathaṃ tiraskṛta iti paribhūte ? , āha ---- antardhyupacārāditi /
GK16vamkalvu:1681: araṇyānīsthānaṃ phalanamitanaikadrumamidam ityādiṣu naikaśabdo dṛśyate , sa ca na siddhyati
GK16vamkalvu:1683: nañ(Pā_6,3.63) iti nalope , tasmānnuḍaci(Pā_6,3.74) iti nuḍāgame satyanekamiti rūpaṃ syāt
GK16vamkalvu:1685: tat kathaṃ naikaśabda ityāha ---- supsupeti samātāt //12//
GK16vamkalvu:1687: madhupipāsumadhuvratasevitaṃ mukulajālamajṛmbhata vīrudhām ityādiṣu madhupipāsuprabhṛtīnāṃ samāso gamigāmyādiṣu pipāsuprabhṛtīnāṃ pāṭhāt /
GK16vamkalvu:1693: bimbādharaḥ pīyate iti prayogo dṛśyate , sa ca na yuktaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1696: tatkathaṃ bimbādhara ityatrāha ---- vṛttau madhyamapadalopinyāṃ śākapārthivāditvātsamāse madhyamapadalopini samāse sati bimbākāro'dharo
GK16vamkalvu:1719: sacchāstrajanmā hi vivekalābhaḥ , kāntavṛttayaḥ prāṇāḥ iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1721: hastāgram agrahastaḥ , puṣpāgram , agrapuṣpamityādayaḥ prayogāḥ katham ?
GK16vamkalvu:1732: nipātenāpyabhihite karmaṇi na karmavibhaktiḥ, parigaṇanasya prāyikatvāt //
GK16vamkalvu:1733: anabhihite ityatra sūtre tiṅkṛttaddhitasamāsaiḥ iti parigaṇanaṃ kṛtam /
GK16vamkalvu:1739: śakeḥ śakisahośca(Pā_3,1.99) iti karmaṇi yati sati śakyamiti rūpaṃ bhavati
GK16vamkalvu:1748: śakyaṃ ca śvamāṃsādibhirapi kṣut pratiantum iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1750: tena śakyā bhaṅktuṃ jhaṭiti visinīkandavaccandrapādāḥ ityapi bhavati //23//++
GK16vamkalvu:1752: yenāṅgavikāraḥ(Pā_2,3.20) ityatra sūtre yathāṅgānāṃ hānistathādhikyamapi vikāraḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1753: yathā ---- akṣṇāḥ kāṇaḥ iti bhavati , tathā mukhena vilocanaḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1756: āyuṣaḥ kṛmikīṭānāmalaṅkaraṇamalpatā ityatra kṛmikīṭānāmiti prayogo na yuktaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1761: kharoṣṭrau vāhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ityatra kharoṣṭrāviti prayogo na yuktaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1764: lāvaṇyamutyādya ivāsa yatnaḥ ityatrāsetyasaterdhātoḥ , asa gatidīptyādāneṣu ityasya prayogaḥ , nāsteḥ ; bhūbhāvavidhānāt //27//
GK16vamkalvu:1766: yo bhartṛpiṇḍasya kṛte na yuddhyed iti prayogaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1769: tat kathaṃ yuddhyedityāha yudhaḥ kyaci yudhamātmana icched yuddhyediti //28//
GK16vamkalvu:1779: curādiṣu sphuṭa bhede , ghaṭa saṃghāte, hantyarthāśca iti pāṭhāt //30//
GK16vamkalvu:1781: anucarī priyatamā madālasā ityatrānucarīti na yuktaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1793: patralaṃ vanamidaṃ virājate ityatra patralamiti katham ? /
GK16vamkalvu:1806: hantereva , kvibeva , bhūtakāla eveti caturvidhaścātra niyamaḥ iti niyamānyataraviṣayo nirūpyaḥ //35//
GK16vamkalvu:1809: iti niyamāt brahmādiṣveva , hantereva , kvibeva , bhūtakāla eveti caturvidhaścātra niyamaḥ iti niyamāt arihā , ripuhā ,
GK16vamkalvu:1821: tataḥ kṛdantairvidādibhiḥ saha brahmādīnāṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1828: bhiduraṃ kāṣṭham bhiduraṃ tamaḥtimirabhiduraṃ vyomnaḥ śṛṅgam ...... iti ,
GK16vamkalvu:1829: chidurātapo divasaḥmatsaracchiduraṃ premabhaṅgurā prītiḥmātaṅgaṃ mānabhaṅguram ityādayo'pi prayogā dṛśyante /
GK16vamkalvu:1832: karmakartari cāyamiṣyate ityatra , cakāraḥ kartari cetyasya samuccayārthaḥ //38//
GK16vamkalvu:1838: avataraśabdasyāpacāyaśabdasya ca dīrghatvahrasvatvavyatyāso bālānāṃ bāliśānāṃ prayogeṣviti
GK16vamkalvu:1844: atra hastādāne cerasteye(Pā_3,3.40) iti ghañprāpta iti //40//
GK16vamkalvu:1848: śubha śumbha śobhārthau iti śubherbhidāderākṛtigaṇatvādaṅ siddha eva /
GK16vamkalvu:1850: śobhārthāvityatraikadeśe , kiṃ śobhā , āhosvicchobha iti viśeṣāvagatirācaryaparamparopadeśāditi
GK16vamkalvu:1851: avidhau guroḥ striyāṃ bahulaṃ vivakṣā // VKal_5,2.42 [*VKal_5,2.41] //
GK16vamkalvu:1852: avidhāvavavidhāne gurośca halaḥ(Pā_3,3.103) iti striyāṃ bahulaṃ vivakṣā /
GK16vamkalvu:1856: vivakṣāvivakṣe yathā bādhā bādhaḥ , ūhā ūhaḥ , vrīḍā vrīḍaḥ , iti //42//
GK16vamkalvu:1858: vyavasitaḥ , pratipanna ityādiṣu bhāvakarmavihito'pi ktaḥ kartari /
GK16vamkalvu:1862: bruvaḥ pañcānāṃ ......(Pā_3,4.84) ityādinā āheti laṭ vyutpāditaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1863: sa bhūte prayuktaḥ ---- ityāha bhagavān prabhuḥ iti /
GK16vamkalvu:1867: anukaroti bhagavato nārāyaṇasya ityatrāpi manyesmaśabdaḥ kavinā prayukto lekhakaistu pramādānna likhita iti //44//
GK16vamkalvu:1875: kuvalayadalanīlā kokilā vālacūte ityādiṣu nīteti cintyam /
GK16vamkalvu:1877: nīlaśabdāt jānapada ......(Pā_4,1.42) ityādisūtreṇa prāṇini ca(Vārttika_2457) iti ḍīṣvidhānāt
GK16vamkalvu:1879: ito manuṣyajāteḥ(Pā_4,1.65) , ūṇutaḥ(Pā_4,1.66) ityatra manuṣyajātervivakṣā , avivakṣā ca lakṣyānusārataḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1880: mandarasya madirākṣi ! pārśvato nimnanābhi na bhavanti nimnagāḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1882: atra manuṣyajātervivakṣāyāṃ ito manuṣya jāteḥ(Pā_4,1.65) iti ṅīṣi sati ,
GK16vamkalvu:1884: nābhiśabdāt punaḥ , itaśca prāṇyaṅgāt ......(Vārttika_3189) itīkāre kṛte ,
GK16vamkalvu:1888: atra nimagnanābheḥ iti manuṣyajātervivakṣeti ṅīṣ na kṛtaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1889: sutanu jahihi maunaṃ paśya pādānataṃ mām(k:sutanu jahihi kopaṃ .......) ityatra manuṣyajāteravivakṣeti sutanuśabdāt ūṅutaḥ(Pā_4,1.66) ityūṅi sati hrasvatve sutanu iti siddhyati /
GK16vamkalvu:1893: uta ūṅ vihita ūkārāntādapi kvacid bhavati /
GK16vamkalvu:1902: kārtikīyo nabhasvān ityatra kālāṭṭhañ(Pā_4,3.11) iti ṭhañ durdharaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1905: śārvaraṃ tamaḥ ityatra ca kālāṭṭhañ(Pā_4,3.11) iti ṭhañ durdharaḥ //50//
GK16vamkalvu:1907: śāśvataṃ jyotiḥ ityatra śāśvatamiti na siddhyati kālaṭṭhañ(Pā_4,3.11) iti ṭhañprasaṅgāt /
GK16vamkalvu:1908: yeṣāṃ ca virodhaḥ śāśvatikaḥ(Pā_2,4.9) iti sūtrakārasyāpi prayogaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1910: śāśvate pratiṣedhaḥ iti prayogāt śāśvatamiti bhavati //51//
GK16vamkalvu:1912: rājavaṃśyāḥ , sūryavaṃśyā ityādayaḥ śabdāḥ , tatra sādhuḥ(Pā_4,4.98)
GK16vamkalvu:1913: ityanena sādhyarye yati pratyaye sati sādhayo bhavanti /
GK16vamkalvu:1922: atra tu dāruṇa idam iti vivakṣāyāṃ dāravamiti bhaviṣyati ? naitadevamapi syāt /
GK16vamkalvu:1925: mugdhamā , mauḍimā[k: prauḍhimā] ityādiṣu imanij mṛgyaḥ anveṣaṇīya iti //54//
GK16vamkalvu:1930: guṇavacanabrāhmaṇādibhyaḥ(Pā_5,1.124) iti yaḥ ṣyañ tasya ṣitkaraṇādīkāro bhavati /
GK16vamkalvu:1936: vrīhyādiṣu dhanvanśabdasya pāṭhāt dhanvīti inau sati siddho bhavati //57//
GK16vamkalvu:1948: caturasraṃ śobhata iti tācchīlike ṇināvayaṃ prayogaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1950: na hyatra pūrvavad vṛttiḥ śakyā kartumiti /
GK16vamkalvu:1951: śubheḥ sādhukāriṇyāvaśyake vā ṇiniṃ kṛtvā tadantācca bhāvapratyaye paścād bahuvrīhiḥ kartavyaḥ
GK16vamkalvu:1959: kyaci pratyaye sati kañcukīyā iti bhavati /
GK16vamkalvu:1968: ca(Pā_5,3.79) iti-ilaci kṛte , ṭhājādāvūrdhvaṃ dvitīyādacaḥ(Pā_5,3.83) iti varṇalopātsidhyati
GK16vamkalvu:1977: madhu sarajasaṃ madhyepadmaṃ pibanti śilīmukhāḥ ityādiṣu sarajasamiti na yuktaḥ prayogaḥ anavyayībhāve
GK16vamkalvu:1980: dhṛtadhanuṣi śauryaśālini ityatra dhṛtadhanuṣi ityasaṃjñāyāṃ na yuktaḥ prayogaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1986: durgandhiḥ kāyaḥ ityādiṣu durgandhipade it samānānto durlabhaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:1989: sā dakṣaroṣātsudatī sasarja iti , śikharadati patati raśanā
GK16vamkalvu:1996: teṣu striyāṃ saṃjñāyām(Pā_5,4.143) iti datrādeśo vikalpena siddha eva iti //67//
GK16vamkalvu:1997: kṣatadṛḍhorsa iti na kap, tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt // VKal_5,2.68
GK16vamkalvu:1998: plavaṅganakhakoṭibhiḥ kṣatadṛḍhoraso rākṣasāḥ ityatra dṛḍhoraḥśabdād , uraḥprabhṛtibhyaḥ kap(Pā_5,4.151) iti kap na
GK16vamkalvu:2001: samāsavākyaṃ tvevaṃ kartavyam ---- kṣataṃ dṛḍhoro yeṣāmiti //68//
GK16vamkalvu:2011: striyāḥ puṃvat ......(Pā_6,3.34) iti puṃvadbhāvasya priyādiṣu niṣedhāt //71//
GK16vamkalvu:2013: dṛḍhabhaktirasau jyeṣṭhe atra pūrvapadasya striyām[k: astriyām] ityavivakṣitatvāt[k: vivakṣitatvāt]
GK16vamkalvu:2021: anyathā , tilakavatī kanakavatī ityādiṣu matupi , matau bahvaco'najirādīnām(Pā_6,3.119) iti dīrghatvaṃ syāt /
GK16vamkalvu:2022: kecittu varṇayanti ---- nadyāṃ matup(Pā_4,2.85) iti yo matup
GK16vamkalvu:2027: śameḥ lyapi lyapi laghupūrvāt(Pā_6,4.56) ityayādeśe sati niśamayyeti bhavitavyam , na niśamyeti
GK16vamkalvu:2030: śamo darśane iti curādau ṇici mitsaṃjñakasya niśamayyeti rūpam //75//
GK16vamkalvu:2054: harati hi vanarājirgacchatī śyāmabhāvamityādiṣu gacchatīprabhṛtiṣu śabdeṣu
GK16vamkalvu:2062: tṛtīyādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskaṃ puṃvadgālavasya(Pā_7,1.74) iti puṃvadbhāvena goptreti
GK16vamkalvu:2065: patitaṃ vetsyasi kṣitau ityatra vetsyasīti na siddhyati /
GK16vamkalvu:2080: suhṛddurhṛcchabdābhyāṃ yuvādipāṭhādevāṇi kṛte , hṛdbhagasindhvante ......(Pā_7,3.19) iti hṛdantasya taddhite'ṇi kṛte satyubhayapadavṛddhau satyāṃ sauhārdaṃ dauhārdamiti bhavati //83//
GK16vamkalvu:2082: rameranudāttopadeśatvāt , nodāttopadeśasya ......(Pā_7,3.34) ityādinā vṛddhapratiṣedhasyābhāvāt kathaṃ virama iti /
GK16vamkalvu:2087: uparyādiṣu śabdeṣu sāmīpye dvirukteṣu uparyadhyadhasaḥ sāmīpye(Pā_8,1.7)
GK16vamkalvu:2088: ityanena uparyādiṣu triṣu dvitīyāmreḍitānteṣu iti dvitīyā /
GK16vamkalvu:2095: guṇavacanasya(Pā_8,1.12) iti dvirvacane kṛte karmadhārayavadbhāve ca mandamandamiti prayogaḥ
GK16vamkalvu:2098: anekabhāgātmakasya nuderyadā sarve bhāvā mandatvena vyāptuymiṣṭā bhavanti tadā vīpseti //86//
GK16vamkalvu:2100: nidrādrukkādraveyacchaviruparilasaddhargharo vārivāhaḥ ityatra nidrādruk iti na yuktaḥ /
GK16vamkalvu:2111: tena aṅgulisaṅge ityanena avantisenaḥindusenaḥ evamādayaḥ śabdaḥ pratyuktāḥ pratyākhyātāḥ
